Dating: 3RD INTERMEDIATE PERIOD (not before); LATE PERIOD (not after)
Name: Faience shabti
Description: A finely modelled, pale green faience shabti, standing on a plinth. In it's arms it carries a hoe and a pick, a basket is thrown over the left shoulder. There is no detail on the wig but the beard is plaited. The inscription in incised in a single column on the back pillar.
